english.segment1: You've got a secret no one knows. Locked away where no one goes. Deep inside your heart. It's tearing you apart
english.segment2: You hide the pain in all you do. But still the shackles binding you. Are heavier than stone. But you are not alone
english.segment3: PRE-CHORUS: When you're down. Look around. And you'll see.. I am with you
english.segment4: Look to me. And you'll see. I will be.. there to guide you
english.segment5: Take my hand. And I can. Lead you on.. for you know that
english.segment6: CHORUS: I am the answer. I am the way. I am the promise. I have called your name
english.segment7: So you want a brand new start. Asking Me into your heart. Down on bended knee. For the world to see
english.segment8: And the chains around your heart. Fall away and break apart. Suddenly you see. The truth has set you free
english.segment11: Surrounded by darkness you stumbled along. Knowing the road that you traveled was long. But I'm here beside you..yes, here all along. The one that will carry you on..
english.segment14: Oh when you are down. You think no ones around. But I'll be with you both night and day
english.segment15: I know the good times. I'll see you through bad times. Oh you know that I'm here to stay
english.segment17: When you're down. Look around. And you'll see I am with you
